title: TikTok and Netflix Pull Back From Russia, Adding to Its Tech and Media Isolation
sub_head: Chinese-owned social-media platform halts new content in Russia in response to ‘fake news’ law; U.S. streaming giant suspends its service there amid operational challenges
body:
TikTok on Sunday suspended new content from Russia and Netflix Inc. halted its service there, adding to moves by tech and media companies to pull back from the country following its invasion of Ukraine.
TikTok said it had suspended new video uploads and live streaming to the video-sharing service in Russia, after the country implemented a law threatening prison time for anyone publishing what authorities consider to be false information about the invasion of Ukraine.
